text: .@SpeakerRyan: A bi-partisan majority of House members support strong legislation to protect Dreamers. Let them vote. Let democracy rule.

Heidi & I are lifting up in prayer the family & friends of the Richardson police officer killed last night in the line of duty, along w the @RichardsonTX_PD. We are grateful for the tremendous bravery of our first responders who work around the clock to keep us safe. #BackTheBlue https://twitter.com/RichardsonTX_PD/status/961462347498958848 QT @RichardsonTX_PD We are confirming that we have lost one of our own. Our officer is deceased. We are not identifying him at this time. We ask for your prayers during this tragedy. Thank you.
